content: chikorita is approximately 14cm tall and 5 5cm in width and approximately 7 5cm from front to back weight 35grams this includes all materials used to make chikorita you will need the following to make the amigurumi 2mm hook stylecraft special dk in kelly green and scheepjes in almelo polyester toy filling fibres in burgundy white and black needle felting* needle felting tool* 1 x pipe cleaner pins to place pieces before sewing together darning needle stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers * please note that i have used needle felting to create the eyes needle felting is still quite new to me so i will not be including instructions on how to do this there are lots of instructions out there if you do want to give it a go you may want to look into alternative ways of creating the eyes
